results.content: The course it's really interesting and i learned some new stuffs, but the voice it's really low most chapters and i think it's really necessary to know the goal of any chapter at the beginning of each one, but i really apreciate the knowledge shared of the exposer. Thanks for the course

response.content: Thank you, for your kind review of you, but I would be happy if the rating was five stars
